item.title: GCP Binary Authorization and Vulnerability Scanning Demo
item.description: Sample application for GCP Binary Authorization + Vulernability Scanner. Creates GKE cluster with Binary Authorization Enables Binary Authoriztion policy on cluster Cloud Builder workflow checks checked in code to Cloud Source repository Builds container image and pushes to Cloud Container Registry Binary Auhorization step waits for Vulernability Scan to complete If Vulernability Scanner Fails, Deployment Fails If Succeeds, the imae is authorized for deployment to GKE Note: this sample uses one cloud builder configuration to both build the image and do attestation.
